name: Deadly Contagion
description:
Welcome to the city of Petrópolis
Three forest rangers and a mysterious ABIM agent have been dispatched to Santa Tereza Mansion in the small town of Petrópolis. However, some unexpected events occur, dividing the team.
With the team separated, Marcos Nunes, an experienced forest ranger, is tasked with investigating the mysteries plaguing the mansion. He conducts a thorough investigation, exploring every corner of the mansion, collecting essential resources, and facing mysterious creatures.
Discover what happened in this place, help your team, and fight for your survival.





Raytrace and DLSS support




"Make every bullet count."
